Posts.Content: teresainidaho wrote: My best friend was diagnosed with stage 3c breast cancer two months ago.  She had a mastectomy and they also removed 21 lymph nodes.  17 of them were malignant.  A body scan after surgery did not show any cancer in any other parts of her body.  She has had her fourth chemo treatment.  She is a fighter, but as you can imagine, the treatments leave her sick and exhausted.  She sleeps for three days following a treatment.  Her husband of 15 years has begun to drink heavily every night, often staying at bars until the early morning hours and driving heavily under the influence.  He has now started to say things like "You spend all my money; you're no fun anymore because all you do is sleep."  She is devastated.  How can I help her Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How do I help my friend? teresainidaho Celtic_Spirit
